name: game-spotlights-ai
description: Real-time personalized game highlights using AWS AI/ML services

scripts.install-deps: cd infrastructure && npm install && cd ../src && find . -name package.json -execdir npm install \;
scripts.lint: echo 'Linting not configured - add ESLint for production'
scripts.security-check: echo 'Security scanning not configured - add npm audit for production'
scripts.clean: rm -rf infrastructure/node_modules infrastructure/dist infrastructure/cdk.out && find src -name node_modules -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true

author: Game Spotlights AI Team
